short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the world of Super Mario with this exciting and colorful browser theme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perfect for fans of the iconic game series, this theme brings the beloved Mario and his friends right to your browser, providing a vibrant and engaging experience every time you open a new tab. 

Beyond the stunning visuals, this Mario theme includes a host of practical features designed to enhance your browsing experience. The shortcut function allows you to easily access your most-used apps and websites directly from your new tab, saving time and effort. 

Need to check the time? No problem—this theme includes a stylish and easy-to-read time display that’s always visible in the corner of your screen.

For added convenience, the Mario theme also lets you save your favorite websites with its bookmark function, so you can quickly visit the pages you love. 

Plus, the notes feature ensures that you can jot down important reminders or ideas without interrupting your workflow, all accessible right from the new tab.

The theme switching function allows you to customize your experience by effortlessly changing the look and feel of your browser whenever you want. Whether you're in the mood for a classic Mario theme or want something fresh, you have the freedom to personalize your browser in a way that suits you.

With the Mario theme, you get both functionality and fun, making your time online as enjoyable as a Mario adventure! Customize your browser now and bring a piece of the Mushroom Kingdom to your daily browsing experience.
